author: Joe Lim
text: Poorly maintained gym. Security wise, more than a handful of lockers are broken or in disrepair. Rowing machine spoilt. Soap dispenser empty. Missing or incomplete dumbells. It is such a sad state for members to use. I also cannot comprehend how they will entice new members to join. Seems the gym owners are blind to these faults or they are not bothered to repair.

author: Durrah Rafi
text:
Very disappointed with Anytime Fitness Paya Lebar. A payment failed due to a bank issue beyond my control, yet I was still charged a late fee. When I reached out for help, the gym dismissed my concerns and pushed all responsibility onto me. Their response showed no empathy or willingness to support a paying customer.

If you value fair treatment, I would not recommend this branch. Other Anytime Fitness locations provide better management and customer service, save yourself the frustration.

This was the response I got from them when I asked for help:
‚ÄúGood morning, if the issue is due to bank , then bank should bear this extra cost incurred to you and do the needful from their end. Hope you understand our side that just like you, we, AFPL can not bear this extra cost either as its not even our fault.‚Äù

As a paying customer, I had expected more understanding and support from the gym. Definitely not continuing my membership here after this experience.

author: Potato
text: The shower doesn't have hot water, and after aerobic exercise, you can only use cold water. The drastic change in body temperature can cause blood vessels to contract too quickly, posing a risk. Additionally, the equipment is outdated, and the water from the dispenser has a strange taste. I strongly recommend going to another place; this one is completely unacceptable.

author: Hung Hao
text:
Mixed feelings- this is an awesome place for those hustling for a narly leg pump. With a myriad of leg day machines, even the famed Hack Squat, I would love to come here for a leg day workout!

There is certainly more than enough machines here to tickle any fancy. I think that it is rather spacious, and also I went at the peak and did not find it crowded.

Another plus point would be the two vending machines, one with purely drinks, and another one with more protein based beverages.

However, there are certain things that I found lacking.

Firstly, free weight dumbbells only go up to the maximum weight of 40kg, and surprisingly, the pair of 37.5kgs were missing.  Colour me confused, as I expected dumbbells to usually hit about 50kg in max weight. Not that I use those, but still, probably important for the big guy right?

Secondly, the toilet seemed rather dirty when I used it. Again, not the end of the world and certainly not a reflection of the outlet. But it would be nice to figure that out.

author: Lucien Lim
text: Has all the equipment needed for a complete workout. Do note the limited amount of benches, which can make waiting times longer during peak hours. Aside from that, the gym is well maintained with clean toilets and equipment.

author: Alexander Aaltonen
text: All around a very good AF gym outlet! It's really nice and neat now after they renovated and updated their equipment! I come here quite frequently, but I try to avoid peak hours as it tends to get quite crowded. ü¶æü¶ø ‚Ä¶

author: Hiroki Maeda
text: Most of the equipment was old and poorly maintained, and quite a few were unavailable due to them being faulty. General environment was quite musty too. I would recommend checking out other AFs around the area.

author: Derrick Yeo
text: Good fitness anytime but please be aware they don't provide candy.

author: Reno Chai
text:
-0.5 star for gym members always not re-racking properly. Even when people do re-rack, they do it for the sake of re-racking to show they re-rack, in the picture you can see that I often have to go through multiple plates of 20kg to get to a lighter plate :)

-0.5 star star for not having dedicated benching Station, the ones here people kept have to readjust the seat and stuff...

-1 star for not fixing or replacing broken equipment like the pulldown machine bar shown in the picture... its super uncomfortable and its been broke for at least 4months now...

If I could take another half a star off I would, but google review only can +-1 üòâ
--------------------------------

Updates, the broken pulldown machine bar has been replaced to a new one right after I write this review ;) coincidence? I think not :)

author: LS Nosaj
text: First time visit this gym at around 8am in the morning just now, unexpectedly clean. Was thinking the space is small at first , but actually quite spacious, you will get most of the basic machine and dumbell weight at this gym. Very good for quick workout!

author: Jung Ro
text:
Usually, when you first register, they say you have to buy a key, so I paid money and bought it, and when I said I wanted to cancel, they said I had to pay for two months, so I paid, but when I tried to return the key, they said they couldn't refund it. When I asked why it wasn't possible, they said they couldn't give it to me because I don't exercise much. When I asked why they kept charging me when I didn't exercise, the manager's response was very slow and very rude. Please be aware of this and choose the Paya Lebar branch.
ps. how you guys doing business like this? amazing.....

author: Cwy Chia
text:
Location is quite good!
Machines are quite okay, but could use a bit more updating.
Toilets could be cleaner

author: Nathanael Khoo
text:
It's a nice gym to workout in. It's near my workplace so it's really convenient for me.

Toilets are clean. Shower area is clean. The gym is spacious and it has machines for all muscle groups. (Especially legs).

Staff is friendly, greets you when you enter and leave.

The music is always upbeat and keeps me motivated throughout my workouts. (All I Do Is Win by DJ Khaled always pumps me up)

Overall, good vibes.

author: Jake Lo
text: It‚Äôs clean but why are the machines so close together? Are they just not in use so they got pushed aside?

author: Ajay Kumar
text: It‚Äôs a nice Gym with a plenty of space... üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è ‚Ä¶

author: Stephen H
text:
Avoid this gym branch if you can, seriously. I'm already regretting it. First, they charge you a late payment admin fee of 14$ if your online monthly payment fails even once, even if you try to resolve on the same day.

Another negative point is "customer service". Mr. Zacky, the manager of the branch, has some severe attitude issues, and is very rude/unfriendly. You may want to be careful when approaching him. He had complained to me about how understaffed his branch is and how he is preparing for some competition, to which I said that he would need some help. His answer was "you mean I need mental help?". Something just seems wrong here, doesn't it?

Only plus side is 24-hour availability of the gym, and somewhat decent equipment. But with the above experience, I'll think of cancelling and getting out of this place as soon as I can.

author: Jeremy Chan
text:
Tried this gym out for the 1st time today. Wasn‚Äôt thoroughly impressed. The equipment are old & outdated, albeit to be frank they are still in working order & can still be used. Cables are lacking IMO though. They don‚Äôt even have the wide double cables ubiquitous in most gyms for you to do wide cable flies(flys) for you chest etc.

Probably wouldn‚Äôt go to this gym again unless for some reason I‚Äôm really reaaaally close by. But then again the Geylang Central AF is also close by and 1 I prefer.

The AFs @ City Hall & Chai Chee are also pretty close by and they have a wider variety of equipment that are also more contemporary. They are both also larger than the Payar Lebar AF.

If Payar Lebar AF does a revamp like update their equipment(yes, this gym‚Äôs highest dumbbells are 40kg, definitely too low for a major gym.), & also IMO repaint the entire gym as the colours in the gym honestly don‚Äôt help the ambience, this gym could be a winner.

author: Yeo Kai Wen
text: Clean and spacious gym when you visit during off-peak hours. Be prepared to wait if you come during peak hours after 5pm - the gym is relatively small and has limited equipment for sharing. If there were more than 15 people in the gym I think I would have to head elsewhere for my workout. Lighting was good, machines were relevant and sufficient for my workout plan. Toilets - there are 3 toilets, 2 of which are unisex and 1 reserved for females.

author: Joseph Silenzio
text: Stuffy, esp at dumbbell area as the gym doesn't switch on all their air conditioners. Have drop mirrors but the equipment arrangement was no very smart as dumbbell racks block the mirrors, esp the bar bells and light weights. So don't know what's the drop mirrors are for. Spacious after Reno, cleaner. These warrant the stars for the gym.

author: Bubba Gump
text:
Quite spacious.
Music choice is very bad, pls improve. At time of review, they were playing Vanilla Ice Ice baby

author: Gary Lim
text: No fuss , very friendly and accommodating Staff

author: sasha queenie
text: I like this gym but there are a few issues. The area is huge but they did not utilize the space well. For example, the dumbbell area: they could easily put another rack of dumbbells beside the existing one. Move the barbells away; the mirrors are already built. Now the barbells are blocking the mirrors. Another issue, do not go before 10 am. It is super hot. Like a sauna. What a waste.

author: pR2O H3Uf
text: Worst owner management at this branch. The aircon is off between 22:00 and 10:00 but the gym is supposed to be 247 they are too stingy too much cost cutting when we pay too much for the membership fees anyway. And the ceiling is always leaking on your head in the weights area. And there‚Äôs a cockroach infestation under the carpet! It‚Äôs disgusting. And the staff that sit at the door to make sure you take your temperature etc are nasty, they are not friendly.

author: Hanneke Leijdekkers
text:
Nice equipment's, 24/7 open, but NOT 24/7 air-conditioning!!?

2019: Still no air-conditioning!!! Very bad!!!
And this time no music at all.... not nice to do you workout in this environment.

2018: The music is good now and they do have cleaning wipes! üëç
But it's very hot in this gym. Hopefully they will manage this too! üòÄüí™
Alas they can't manage, they say... The aircon is central for the whole mall and starts just at 10 am. But they have there own aircons, but they are switched off. Why can the neighbors (Evolve) do it and Anytime can't?
It was my favorite gym in Singapore, but due to the heat not anymore.

2017: Nice gym!
Clean and nice (and a lot of different) equipment's!
I'll sure come back when I am in Singapore again. üëç

The only things I was missing was cleaning wipes to clean te equipments after use and the music should be much louder!

author: Â≠îÈ¶ôÂë≥
text: Nice gym! Bright and clean!

author: Aaron Thor
text:
This is a Covid period review. I gave 4/5 before way before covid even started.

Nowadays, I noticed members don't even wipe off and clean after using the equipments. Bench, machines or handle attachments on the cable machine. Sweat all over...

There is even a member got the balls to tell me why bother cleaning?... Some members don't even bring the towel too.

I think the Staffs gotta tighten up on this and ensure members wipe equipment, bring own towel, check vaccinated status, use hand sanitizer before entering the gym.

Everyone gotta play a part to end this thing. Don't really wanna see another lockdown and all we can blame is ourselves for being irresponsible.

author: Wing
text: Great gym n staff diligently maintaining gym. Unfortunately some regular users workout without bringing own towels. Suggest staff approach them to buy AF towel; it's basic hygiene and also being considerate to other users.

author: Johan Lim
text: Decent space but poor communications.  Updating the club hours or closing for renovations. No channel to contact with staff online. Gym a little dark and dank, smells abit. Only 3 toilets.

author: Lee Hong Rui
text: Visited this gym when I‚Äôm working around the area. Gym is well maintained and not crowded which is good since no one will be stressing you to use the machines. Will return whenever I‚Äôm around the area :)

author: Nexus Training
text:
The team is very personable with excellent customer service skills and the gym is well maintained.
Unfortunately I had to be away from SG for an extended period of time.
I'll be back AF Paya Lebar

author: Warren Vazquez
text: Clean, cool and spacious. Also, my fob worked perfectly and let me in immediately (I‚Äôm a UK member so very happy to see multigym access works efficiently ).

author: Wade Castro
text: very busy throughout the whole afternoon,plates and dumbbells aren‚Äôt in order and the 1-10kg dumbbells are across the gym from the 12.5-40kg dumbbells.machines are very adjustable so i recommend going to Bedok anytime fitness

author: Kevin
text:
Avoid this branch at all cost.

If you‚Äôre really keen on signing up, go to other branches where the staffs are much more knowledgeable and responsive.

author: Sky Lee
text: Second time see the cockaroach at the weight lifting area. Feel not clean and safe to gym at here. Hope they will fix this issue ASAP.

author: Syafiq Rokman
text: Gym doesn't allow spotting other people. Stay away from trainer Rafiq.

author: Nurhairula Nordin
text: I feel at home while working out. Atmosphere is nice. Seeing the regular gym goers makes me feel motivated every day! üí™ ‚Ä¶

author: KT SocMed
text: If you‚Äôre not gonna pick up your phone or have. whatsapp acc for your number please do me a favour and throw your phone into the canal pls thanks

author: M H Simon
text: Level 2 is great for dancing and pulling the wheels but Level 1 gets packed very fast

author: Spencer Paw
text: Some of the equipment is positively disintegrating. Also, the bathroom ceilings are infested with some kind of fly.

author: Frankie Wee
text: Nice place to get yourself workout. Easy to locate and do not need to worry if its rain. Stay healthy workout Regularly.

author: harith rahim
text: Just attended the pre sales booth and customer service was excellent. Looking forward to opening and trying out the gym as the location is so convenient!!!!

author: H K
text: Signing up was easy, but exiting isn't as straightforward.

author: Dan M
text: my second home. love the manager here. she is very nice. her name is Shubbs

author: Ana Mal
text: Tried to reach the number which display on the location window, seems no proper persons are there and no response even try to reach this 91544755 and the service is kind of unprofessionalism,

author: Mark Wu
text: It took me 1 hour to find the place! It is in 2F not 1F! And no one even pick up the phone to help me!

author: Daryle Dale De Silva
text: Basic gym. Just don't like that they only turn on half of the ACs before 10am. It's a bit hot for us morning goers

author: XT M
text: They have a spacious area for aerobics, stretching and also ample cardio equipment.

author: Kishore Rochey
text: They have renovated the gym. Better and friendly staff.

author: M Dali
text: Good range of equipment with alternative options. Good floor space and well spaced out.

author: Yeow Jian Wu
text: Got the first time free trial. Equidment is complete. Just the space a bit small and complex.

author: Sam Sama
text: Sometimes a bit crowded but you can negociate the price. The machines are good

author: Casey Tay
text: Decent spot. Free weights area a bit too cramp for my liking though.

author: Muhamad Tassri
text: Most well equipped AF franchise I‚Äôve gone too!

author: Shakerin
text: There are enough equipments; more space required; space extension started recently

author: Liew Wocholas
text: Good environment for body builder to train but traffic is high

author: Ogy Ali
text: The equipments and washrooms are well maintained.

author: Tan Jieyi
text: Poor customer services and facilities not properly maintained , do improve on it

author: Fernand Toh Zhi Qi
text: Not for early morning goer. Aircon was non existent.

author: Russell Sia
text: Lovely and friendly management, i love you all üòòü•∞ ‚Ä¶

author: D.J
text: They are increasing the tools. Good environment

author: Dawid Makowski
text: Bare minimum what you need for good price

author: Ferhan Feroze
text: Nice Gym

author: Melissa Goh
text: Did not like the vibe at all.

author: Kannan Asp
text: most of the time toilet was down

author: Xiao Yuxin
text: Go to some local gym or smt.

author: Nazir Khan
text: Poor equipment maintenance

author: Meet John Ng
text: Excellent for working out

author: Aswin Anil
text: Very friendly staff!

author: irfan a.
text: Normal

author: Chew Hock guan
text: Nothing fantastic

author: Sylvester Tan Èô≥Êñá‰øä
text: Weird smell....

author: Bear Melon
text:
Place 3 (MRT Payah Lebar 8 mins)
Machine Variations: 5
Machine: Precor
Space: 4
Cleanses: 3
Service: ?

Free Wi-Fi (Facebook required)

Good for shoulder, arm, and leg training

Anytime Fitness Center in a newer mall.
Transportation is a bit inconvenient.
Machines are Precor-style, but the variety is extensive.

author: Èôà‰Ω©‰∏Ω
text:
Avoid this!!! You will suffer if you don't listen to the advice of others. Others pay 75-90+ per month (less than 100) Others pay automatically every month
I paid it off in three installments (19 months) using atome SGD 1944, and paid 648 x3 in one lump sum. It's too expensive to sign a contract for more than 100 SGD per month! The contract was signed in October 2024, and the more you sign, the more expensive it is. This is a rip-off! And they won't refund me when I return to Malaysia. I have sent them the address on my ic, but they won't cancel it either

author: John
text: This is a professional fitness and weight loss place. Due to well-known reasons, reservations are always made in accordance with the number of people required for isolation measures. I often see customers waiting outside the door. I wish them success in their fitness.

author: Ë≤ùÊòì
text: Never been there
